CustomField.description: This section should be used to outline the review of and subsequent recommendations for clients' existing protection policies.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
This section should be used to outline the review of and subsequent recommendations for clients' existing protection policies.
New clients/proposals: high level summary of proposed policy types, levels, medical issues and justification based on completed needs analysis Recommendations: as above and also include detailed premiums, recommended provider, any deviations from our usual panel & trusts.
CustomField.label: Protection proposal
